text:
Здравейте,

Приложено изпращам фактура за доставка на природен газ за 03.04.2021, съгласно сделка на БГХ.

 

При допълнителни въпроси, моля не се колебайте да се свържете с нас.

 

Поздрави,

Силвия 



 

Силвия Шишкова

Счетоводител 

 

МЕТ Енерджи Трейдинг България ЕАД

Вертиго Бизнес Тауър, Бул. „България“ №109,

район Триадица, София 1404

Мобилен: +359 896 46 32 62

Стационарен: +359 (0) 28 50 40 39

Факс: +359 (0) 28 50 40 39

Е-поща: silvia.shishkova@met.com <mailto:silvia.shishkova@met.com> 

Сайт: www.MET.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.met.com%2F&data=04%7C01%7Csilvia.shishkova%40met.com%7Cf0bd5a5ae3f246c70c6608d8d963bcf5%7C7433bef33b1c409fa6f1049d126b21de%7C1%7C0%7C637498369810069825%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=6WJ7qjp7eApFJ7To4uyuTCfZrsCWLv6xgu5qroWcQf8%3D&reserved=0> 



 

 









Important notice:
This email may contain information that is confidential, legally privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. This information is intended only for the use by the addressee. If you have received this e-mail in error, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or the taking of any action in reliance on the contents of the e-mail or attached files is strictly prohibited. In this event we would ask you to kindly delete this communication from your system and to contact us. Thank you!
MET GROUP has taken steps to ensure that this email (and any attachments) is free from computer viruses and the like. Any emails that you send to us may be monitored for the purposes of ascertaining whether the communication complies with the law and our policies.
